title: Then We Shall Raise Hell
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2SqFoju

by I_Got_Lost

Bucky Barnes woke up from the ice and found out that the world moved on without him.
The good news is that he can technically marry his husband! Go Canada!
The bad news?
Ollie was still dead.
And now, instead of the peaceful happy ending Ollie had teased him about for years, he was having to face the fact that the Norse gods are real, aliens exist, and apparently Howard had a son. He wasn’t sure which one of the three was the weirdest to wrap his head around.
But, either way, ghost are coming out of the woodwork, secrets can’t seem to stay buried, and this is starting to become one hell of an adjustment period.
Twenty-one years old, and he still can’t drink.

Words: 2027, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Please Tell Me You Have a Plan?

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Avengers: Earth’s Mightiest Heroes, Captain America - All Media Types, Captain America (Movies), Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Incredible Hulk (TV), The Incredible Hulk (2008), Hulk- All Media Types, Hawkeye- All Media Types, Thor (Movies), X-Men - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, Gen, M/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Bruce Banner, Peggy Carter, Daniel Sousa, Howard Stark, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Nick Fury, Phil Coulson, Loki (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Maria Hill, Ollie Bakker, Leo Bakker, Howling Commandos
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Bruce Banner/Betty Ross, Peggy Carter/Daniel Sousa, Howard Stark/Maria Stark, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, Jane Foster/Thor
  • Additional Tags: Time Stone is a bitch, Fix-It, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Time Travel, part of a series, the avengers raise hell, Original Character(s), POV Alternating, we break physics, This Is Why We Can’t Have Nice Things, Protective Bucky Barnes, Bucky Barnes Needs a Drink, Artist Steve Rogers, Steve Rogers needs a drink, Howling Commandos - Freeform, we know who they are, Other Additional Tags to Be Added

A place to be the real me

summary: The most important person of his life
title: The most important person of his life
body:
So, surprise @cerberus-s! I’m sure you didn’t expected that hey? Happy birthday darling!

Fiddling unconsciously with his tie, Steve looked at his fiancée doing the buttons of his shirt. He looked handsome, all dressed up in a bespoke black suit… But they couldn’t do anything to ruin this. It was too important.

He watched him putting the cufflinks, calloused fingers brushing them with all the care of the world, and the supersoldier felt the familiar heat running thought his veins. Watching carefully he could see the mischievous glint in his lover’s eyes and nearly laughed at his own obliviousness. Of course, he was going to notice how much he loved his fingers, so skilled and…

Damn it, he thought.

“Stop it. We can’t be late!” he said, lowering his head into the soft bed, rumpled bed sheets testimony of their previous night together… and morning… 

“Hey is not my fault if you are nearly drooling” he laughed, putting the cufflinks on the other sleeve “I’m also enjoying the show, nothing to be ashamed of, darling”

At the confused expression Steve had, his partner looked straight into his eyes with that predatory smile that meant trouble for Steve on his lips; while putting the cufflinks. 


“Oh, you know. Laying on my bed, with a bespoke suit clinging in all the right places, those baby blues blown with lust… Darling you look straight out of my fantasies”

He breathed slowly, trying to keep his own desires at bay, seeing them reflected on the brown eyes that were looking at him through the mirror. They didn’t need words, after years together they understood each other to the point that even on the battlefield, they just needed one glance to understand what they wanted.

But hey, duty calls.

“Better stop right here doll, or we are not going to get any time soon out of here.”

“Yeah, let’s go” 

Before he could get up of the bed, his partner stole a kiss; and Steve could taste the smile on his lips. He lingered just a few seconds, smiley brown eyes against loving sky blue ones.

“And this kiss?”

“Just to remind you how much I love you. And that you are about to be subjected to the public eye…” he bought their hands together, silvery rings shining together “Not every day Captain America announces he is getting married to anyone like me”

Not liking his tone, Steve kissed him on the lips, and then after they pulled to breath, he kept him close, watching him with their foreheads pressed together.

“Tones, you are the most important person in my life, and I don’t care about anyone else opinion about who I love. I know you. Even when you try to hide, I know you. You are my best friend, my lover, my second in command and most important, you are going to be my husband. And to hell with anyone who thinks you are not worthy of that title”

Tony couldn’t help himself, and kissed him again, this time softer and slower, not changing positions. Not moving… Only them in the…

“TONES IF WE ARE LATE TO THE OSCARS CEREMONY I SWEAR I’M GOING TO MURDER YOU”

“Rhodey is right lovebirds, let’s go!”

With a groan, Tony let his forehead rest against Steve’s chest, cursing silently his best friend, Colonel Danvers, the Oscars and the whole world for not letting him spend his evening with the most important person of his life.

blog.name: incorrectmcustuff
blog.title: that's a fake laugh
blog.description: casey / 20 / just another incorrect mcu blog. i'm not special at all.

summary:
Bruce: the thing with batteries is-
Tony: they run out of charge every now and then. that's why they're called batteries.
Bruce:...
body:
Bruce: the thing with batteries is-
Tony: they run out of charge every now and then. that’s why they’re called batteries.
Bruce: that’s not, i don’t think- why are they called that?
Tony: i don’t know.
Bruce: that doesn’t make sense.
Tony: you don’t make sense!

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Marbles
body:

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Spider-Man: Underneath it all
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2IAhB0V

by GroovySophia

Peter is a normal kid. He is a sophomore in high school, gets ok grades, and lots of homework. He also has a few close friends. All of this is true, and completely normal If you didn’t count the part where he has spider like powers.

However lately something big has been brewing beneath the city. Peter can sense it. He doesn’t quite know what it is but if it were to escape from the ground then life as he knew it would be over

Peter is trans ftm in this fic

FYI: Peter has already been bitten (only for a month or so though, aunt may doesn’t know), he is out to his close friends (as a transgender male) and aunt may but other kids at school don’t know. This is taking place before infinity war but infinity war isn’t going to happen in this book. I dont know how much Loki will be in here either. Uncle Ben is out of the picture.

Words: 611, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Multi
  • Characters: Peter B. Parker, Iron Man, Tony Stark, Spider-Man, im prob forgetting something


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2IAhB0V

blog.name: skiplo-wave
blog.title: Rise of Kylo's flirt game
blog.description: Skip/22/black/female/Aro-ace/ graphic design student. Multi fandom/ship with side of discourse. When in doubt block and go. Let's just enjoy fandom and have fun. inbox, pm, and submit is open. @ me if needed Got Ao3 it skiplowave. Need to block antis or certain blogs check: *antis to block, #blogs to block, #blogs to report. Also tags you may need to blacklist if needed: #anti bs, #nsfw, #fandom wank.

summary:
Stephen: you know I hate it when you make up words
Tony: are you still mad at me for saying snacksident?
Stephen: Yes. That's...
body:
Stephen: you know I hate it when you make up words
Tony: are you still mad at me for saying snacksident?
Stephen: Yes. That's exactly why
Peter: Dr.Dad! Mr.Stark we have a snackident in the kitchen! We're out of cereal!
Stephen: THAT is another reason.

dialogue.name: Stephen
dialogue.label: Stephen:
dialogue.phrase: you know I hate it when you make up words

dialogue.name: Tony
dialogue.label: Tony:
dialogue.phrase: are you still mad at me for saying snacksident?

dialogue.name: Peter
dialogue.label: Peter:
dialogue.phrase: Dr.Dad! Mr.Stark we have a snackident in the kitchen! We're out of cereal!

blog.name: redlipstickandplaid
blog.title: Rafael Barba is a feminist icon

title: Drabble Requests
body:
Alright, I have decided to just open up drabble requests again! 

I will write for: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Loki and Rafael Barba. 

You can send me either a prompt and the character you choose or just a gif! xx

(Also, if you have any headcanon requests, I wouldn’t mind those either!)

@emoryhemsworth @supernaturallymarvellous @honey-bee-holly @feelmyroarrrr @princess76179 @myfanficlibrarium @winchesterforever12 @marvelsavengersforever1227 @greeneyedgirls4 @brooke-supernatural16 @steve-thotgers @katykyll @alwayshave-faith @becs-bunker @bitsyb21 @kaliforniacoastalteens @thefanficfaerie @dreila03
